situation.title: Employer/Employee relations
situation.meta_description:
I need the confirmation of a negative test result for the employer.
My employer insists on my physical presence at work, even though I should be quarantined.

content.processed:
I need the confirmation of a negative test result for the employer.

Contact your general practitioner, explain the situation to them, and arrange eŽádanka (online request for testing facilities) for the testing facility.

My employer insists on my physical presence at work, even though I should be quarantined.

The rights to quarantine apply to anyone with a risk contact, whom the hygiene station has contacted. If you have received a notification from eRouška (tracing mobile app), contact the district doctor, who will write you an eŽádanka (online request for testing facilities) and can also write you an eNeschpenka (online sick note for the employer). If your employer still forces you to go to work, they exhort you to violate the Public Health Act, as you can knowingly spread the disease. Therefore, it is better to communicate with them in writing, so that you have his request documented.
